package.description:
To be able to use this package, you will need the following dependencies:
* designator_integration_lisp: https://github.com/code-iai/designator_integration_lisp * iai_common_msgs: https://github.com/code-iai/iai_common_msgs * beliefstate: https://github.com/fairlight/beliefstate
package.author: Jan Winkler
